user_input: Please create hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios for Poland. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format. No need to access any PLEXOS database for now
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operations based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications. Avoid PLEXOS DB interactions; generate hourly hydrogen demand profiles for Poland for TYNDP 2026 (NT, NT_HE, NT_LE) for years 2030, 2035, 2040, 2050 with node splitting, then export to TST format.

function_args.user_input: Generate hourly hydrogen demand profiles for Poland for TYNDP 2026. Scenarios: NT, NT_HE, NT_LE. Years: 2030, 2035, 2040, 2050. Carrier: hydrogen. Enable node splitting. Do not access or require any PLEXOS database; operate on external data sources/files only.

tasks.description: Generate hourly hydrogen demand profiles for Poland for TYNDP 2026 using scenarios NT, NT_HE, NT_LE and years 2030, 2035, 2040, 2050; enable node splitting; no PLEXOS DB access.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Create hourly hydrogen demand profiles for Poland for TYNDP 2026 (NT, NT_HE, NT_LE), years 2030, 2035, 2040, 2050; split nodes; avoid PLEXOS DB.'

tasks.description: Export the generated hourly hydrogen demand profiles to the TST format for TYNDP 2026 (carrier='hydrogen').
tasks.entity_selection_context: Use outputs from 'main_demand_processer_v2' and export to TST format for TYNDP 2026; carrier hydrogen; region Poland; scenarios NT, NT_HE, NT_LE; years 2030, 2035, 2040, 2050.
